name: getcrux
long_description:
GetCrux is building AI Agents for Performance Marketing.

Our first AI Agent - Snapshot is a Reporting Specialist. It helps marketers automate their reporting workflow by gathering data from multiple sources, finds answers to the pressing questions, and uncovers hidden opportunities. With Snapshot, ad agencies and brands are reducing the time spent on repetitive tasks by 80% and taking the right action at the right time, leading to better performance ROI.

GetCrux is backed by Y Combinator, Emergent Ventures and senior execs from Google, Facebook and have recently raised over $2.6M.
